title: Best Designed Daily Planner
content:
Does anybody know of a very well designed daily planner / calendar organizer  
that they would recommend? This would be greatly appreaciated thanks.

--Markmont.
author: markmont

comments.content:
I wish I knew of one, too. Most are so ugly and not well planned. :-(

ChrisL
[The Typotheque Pocket Calendar and Sketchbook](http://web.archive.org/web/20120623032337/http:/www.typotheque.com/books/pocket_calendar_sketchbook_2009) by Johanna & Peter Biľak.

I also use The Typotheque Pocket Calendar but it is not quite robust enough for my wife :-)

ChrisL

Moleskine diaries?

[http://www.moleskine.com/eng/\_interni/catalogo/Cat\_int/catalogo\_diaries.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20120623032337/http:/www.moleskine.com/eng/_interni/catalogo/Cat_int/catalogo_diaries.htm "http://www.moleskine.com/eng/\_interni/catalogo/Cat\_int/catalogo\_diaries.htm")

_"If you hit a wrong note, it’s the next note that you play that makes it good or bad" - Miles Davis_
I use a Moskine as well. It's understated and I like the paper....
